home.title: Welcome to My Personal Homepage!
home.subtitle: Explore my academic and technical journey
home.introduction: I am a graduate of Southern University of Science and Technology and will join Nanyang Technological University in August 2025 to pursue a research-based master's degree. My research interests focus on Technical HCI, exploring innovative applications of large models, machine learning algorithms, and other interesting technologies in interactive systems.

nav.worksDesc: Browse my academic projects and development works to understand my technical skills and innovative thinking
nav.resumeDesc: View my educational background, skills, and work experience for a comprehensive understanding of my professional abilities
nav.honorsDesc: Explore the various awards and recognitions I have received, witnessing my growth and achievements

works.title: My Works
works.subtitle: Showcasing my projects and research achievements

projects.title: RAGTrace: Visual Analysis for Retrieval-Augmented Chain in RAG Systems
projects.description: RAGTrace is an iterative visual analysis system for the retrieval-augmented chain in RAG systems. It helps users understand the interaction between retrieval and augmentation processes in RAG systems, thereby optimizing RAG system performance. We designed force-directed graphs, chunk reordering graphs, and radar charts to present the retrieval and augmentation processes step by step, opening the black box of RAG for users.

projects.title: Machine Vision-based Classroom Quality Analysis
projects.description: We designed a machine vision-based classroom quality analysis system that can automatically analyze student behavior in classrooms and provide corresponding analysis reports. We use VLM models for preliminary classroom content analysis and YOLO models for student behavior analysis.

projects.title: Nimmt 7 AI Battle System
projects.description: We designed an AI battle system and a corresponding front-end and database for the board game Nimmt 7. The AI is divided into six levels, using random, greedy, heuristic greedy, Monte Carlo, and heuristic Monte Carlo tree search algorithms.

projects.title: QQ Group Entertainment Robot Based on Mirai
projects.description: We developed a QQ group entertainment robot based on Mirai, which can automatically reply to group messages and provide various entertainment functions, such as check-ins, lotteries, and large language model conversations. Developed using Java.
